00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                            MtkTimeToOrbitPath                             =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR
00009                                MISR Toolkit
00010 
00011             Copyright 2005, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrOrbitPath.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 #include <string.h>
00023 
00038 MTKt_status MtkTimeToOrbitPath(
00039   const char *datetime, 
00040   int *orbit, 
00041   int *path )
00042 {
00043   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00045   const double JNref[] = MISR_ORBIT_REF;
00046   const double JNref_995 = MISR_ORBIT_REF_995;
00047   double j;
00048   int year, month, day, hour, min, sec;
00049   int num_values;
00050   int ref_num;
00051 
00052   if (datetime == NULL || orbit == NULL || path == NULL)
00053     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00054 
00055   num_values = sscanf(datetime,"%4d-%2d-%2dT%2d:%2d:%2d",&year,&month,
00056                       &day,&hour,&min,&sec);
00057 
00058   if (num_values != 6)
00059     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00060 
00061   if (year < 2000)
00062     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00063 
00064   if (year == 2000 && month < 2)
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00066 
00067   if (year == 2000 && month == 2 && day < 24)
00068     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00069 
00070   status = MtkCalToJulian(year,month,day,hour,min,sec,&j);
00071   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00072 
00073   /* Implement special code for orbits 995-1000 */
00074   
00075   if (j < JNref[0]) {
00076     *orbit = (int)( (233.0 / 16.0 * ( j - JNref_995)) 
00077                    +(995));
00078   } else {
00079     /* The JNref table is to account/adjust for drift in the orbit.
00080        We need to find the closest entry in this table to our orbit. We do
00081        this by determining the approximate orbit first and then using it
00082        to find a more accurate entry in JNref table (ie ref_num = orbit/MISR_ORBIT_REF_DT). 
00083        Then we compute real orbit number. */
00084 
00085     ref_num = (int)((233.0 / 16.0 * ( j - JNref[0])) + MISR_ORBIT_REF_DT /*Nref*/) 
00086              / MISR_ORBIT_REF_DT;
00087     if (ref_num > sizeof JNref / sizeof *JNref)
00088       ref_num = sizeof JNref / sizeof *JNref;
00089 
00090     *orbit = (int)( (233.0 / 16.0 * ( j - JNref[ref_num - 1])) 
00091                    +(ref_num * MISR_ORBIT_REF_DT) );
00092   }
00093 
00094   status = MtkOrbitToPath(*orbit,path);
00095   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00096 
00097   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00098 
00099  ERROR_HANDLE:
00100   return status_code;
00101 }
